#summary Mia-Chat is a web based Ajax chat application.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

Key intentions and achievements of Mia-Chat are: 

  * Simple setup 
  * Ease of use
  * Platform independent
  * Browser agnostic (aims to support the same browsers as [http://docs.jquery.com/Browser_Compatibility jQuery])
  * Support for multiple database platforms

= Requirements =
Mia-Chat will require the following to function:

  * PHP 5
  * Apache Web Server 1.3+
  * One of the following databases; MySQL 4 or 5 , PostgreSQL 7 or 8.
